summary: Dismiss all your Summoned/raised creatures/Thralls no matter where they are, how how many.
descriptionHtml:
This Mod adds a lesser power, or spell, usable at will and at no cost, that will unsummon all your summoned creatures. Atronachs, Thralls and resurrected undead will vanish no matter where they are; next to you, or lost in a dungeon months ago.

This also provides an easy fix for those who walk into town and get told to douse the "deadly
magic"

Technically, This will unsummon anything with a "summon" keyword in the editor, so any mod-
added summons, if they were done properly, will work. if it does not work for a certain mod-
added ceature, have it's creator add the keyword for "summon" for that spell.

Getting the power:
The power is added when you start a new game, to any race. Alternatively, use these console
commands:
- help "Dismiss Summons" 0
This should give you one result, being xx000D63. Enter the following:
- player.addspell xx000D63 (replace xx with whatever the previous command found)

Install:
place esp in your data folder and activate.
author: Dreighton
